responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "5879961D471F59D5374C38840B9CB73D", "The interpretation is difficult. I\'m missing the context for the connection between the Titans and how the Carphin scholars arrived upon this artifact. I always knew the Ring of Mourning was to be worn by the stewards, though some know it a throne, or a place of power. As they say, the ring would \"rest the weary soul after a long journey, allowing them to recover from fatigue completely.\" We have yet to discern whether it is part of the metal in your hands or the place we know as the Titan\'s Ring. The only certainty is that it isn\'t here.")
name: CSQ_DialDef_0014_AkhundBahrani_AstralCircle_115
